name: Love all you have left
description:
Psychological thriller set at the Eastern-Front during World War II.
You'll be Simon, a young Hungarian man, who's only task is to get home in one piece. You'll face your worst fears and dilemmas in your entire life, and it's up to you, how you solve them. Will you perish...? No... They have something else in mind.


  • 5 possible endings
  • 15-20 hours of length
  • 92.000~ words


For a walktrough with spoilers, click the "View the manual" on the store page.




Special thanks for my friends: Skaen, jam, Auntie and Sonny.
